website_summaries.verdict: The stability and safety of this unit makes it a good option for a child who needs a model that can convert from a sitting to standing desk.
pros: The stabilizing crossbar ensures this desk can withstand the treatment of an active child without losing structural integrity
The adjustable workspace can tilt up to 75 degrees, allowing users to convert from a sitting to standing desk
All the edge areas, from the desk top to the legs, are rounded instead of cornered
cons: With the inclusion of the storage area and monitor table, assembly on this desk is not as simple as some ApexDesk models

customer_reviews.title: Can I get seat covers for green chair?
customer_reviews.text: My kids love their desks and chairs. I highly recommend these. Each kids picked different colors. I thought both are same except colors, but the chairs are different. Blue chair is fixed when kid sits on it, but green chair still moves after sitting on. I prefer movable chair. Also blue one has seat covers, but not i green one. Is it a mistake or is it sold like this?
customer_reviews.author: SUN HWA JANG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table! Great buy, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: US has very limited option for adjustable table with pink color. I looked many brand before purchase this one. Other tables are smaller, this one offers larger surface area. Other brand in 500-600$ range do offer a shelf & is made of wood, however, this one is study enough & buying a separate shelf cost 20-30$. So it does offer more value. Assembly is easy, this is easier than Ikea furniture! I love the adjustable feature. It grows with your kids. My daughter are 5 years old & they love it!!!! Overall, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: R.P

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to this team
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old. Things I like: Spacious, very sturdy, adjustable height and can be done by the kid with the lever on the side pretty easily. Kudos to their customer service: I have contacted them saying I need a table soon, and the delivery times were more than a month away. They have been very responsive and sent one from their reserved stock, and that too within 10 days. Really appreciate the excellent customer service for an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just got the shipment. Although the box came all damaged, the content was protected by Styrofoams and bubble wrap so everything was fine inside it. We couldn't find the installation guide inside the boxes so we had to look them up online. The chair and the desk were assembled within an hour. Perfect height for my 6 year old boy. So far he is enjoying the tilt function.
customer_reviews.author: super

customer_reviews.title: Might be difficult to install due to spinning rivet nut
customer_reviews.text: We were looking forward to use this with our 4 year old but it was defective due to spinning rivet nut which prevented the legs from being tightened down properly. We had to search online on how to remove the rivet nut and install a new one along with buying new hardware. Amazon was amazing provide credit to reduce our financial burden on the extra things that we need to get this working.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Liu

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk & great service! I was able to put the desk together by myself which makes it very easy to assemble! For some reason I got an extra “screw B” instead of “Screw A” so I contacted ApexDesk and they were very nice and quick to contact (they contacted me that same day) and offered to send the missing screw AND chair covers for the mix up, which also came within a few days! I’ve had a great experience with this company and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Estella

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a 200$ table chair set
customer_reviews.text: Quality Inspection is not doing their job. It's a good chair and table set. But the quality of the table top is cracked and the paint on metal aren't covered... I see parts of the metal unpainted or paint chipped away.
customer_reviews.author: GoGo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table but the table top came chipped
customer_reviews.text: We like the table and the chair as it feels sturdy, but the table came chipped on one side. I wonder if that would affect the life of the table. Don't want to return the whole thing as I don't have the time to disassemble/repack but if I could replace the tabletop, then that would be a good option. I also can't find a way to connect with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Great child desk.
customer_reviews.text: I needed child{s desk that would grow with my child. So I bought this one. It was not easy to assemble it. But after that, this desk is great. You can adjust it with ease. It is long, so my child has a lot of space to be creative. It build very good. I wanted to buy one more for my daughter, but unfortunately it is not available any more. It is very sad!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great investment to promote learning v
customer_reviews.text: Great desk solid and easy to assemble love that it can grow with my child. Only downfall wish drawer was on right side of desk. Since most children are right handed and like computer in front of them they need to slide in on left to have room to write with drawer on left there is wasted space. But still a great desk!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret J Gibb

customer_reviews.title: This desk is really fantastic! Everyone in my home loves it so much
customer_reviews.text: This desk is really fantastic! Everyone in my home loves it so much! And thanks to the height adjustment, everyone can use it! The chair is so comfortable, you will not feel tired after 2 or more hour's study on it. Both of the desk and the chair are easy to assemble, it may only take you 30 minutes or less, and they are absolutely sturdy and beautiful. We have nothing to complain with the best desk and chair all of the world, this is the best gift for our son and we are sure we will buy a pink one for our daughter in the future! Thank you so much, ApexDesk!
customer_reviews.author: desperado99

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money overall
customer_reviews.text: This desk is good for school aged kids. The book clip is not as expected. There is improvement there. I leave the handler on and it takes extra space. Be careful because it is on one side. The chair is comfortable. If your kids use eraser for pencil writing then it is a bit hard to clean. I have to use vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Simple ,sturdy study Table.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good study table .It's going to last very long .It's simple with all the basic needs. It's not too fancy but it's very sturdy.I wanted a table without any distraction for my kiddo when he sits to learn. It's exactly what I expected. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sushant Mudholkar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an adjustable table that will help your child to sit in a right position to avoid the spine problems in the future. This is a great desk that will grow with your child, very good quality, and modern design. Also, ApexDesk offers space to lay out the kid's work and to adjust it to however they're comfortable. I also really like the scale that is recommended with the appropriate height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Box coming upside down, causing the damage of the Crossbar. The edge of one of the legs cut my palm while unpack the box. Pros: Good customer service. After contacting the seller, the replacement parts was received in a few days. And the desk is very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rui Yan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We love this desk set! It’s sturdy and lots of space to put thing on the table. It can be used for many years for sure! The desk came with a scratch on the surface but got a replacement really quickly from the seller. The customer service was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lin

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing my review after using this set for one year. I'm very satisfied!! My girls does everything on it, she draws with different kind of paint, makes the desk dirty but everything is cleanable. Desk material is adjusted to that. Chair is very convenient. Some parts of the desk and chair are of metal. The package traveled to Armenia - a long distance and nothing was damaged or missing in the package. People complaining of damaged packaging or something like that, this is the issue of transporting company, but not company that sells it. I like the desk and the chair. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Avedyan Arpine

customer_reviews.title: Great first desk for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought the desk last year for my older son and we liked it so much that I bought a second one for my younger son. It is relatively easy to assemble and my kids love their desks. The newer version has a extra shelf and drawer which I did not have with the first one. I wihed we coudl purchase those for the first desk too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk and chair for my 6 Years old boy. The desk and chair arrived on time. It is easy to be assembled. My boy loves it! It works great for him to do his daily study! I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Worthy the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I bought this table. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. The table is much bigger than other adjustable tables and it is very easy to adjust the height. The chair didn’t come with the seat cover, but after I contacted the seller, the sent one very soon. I will buy another one for my younger daughter when she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Very good table and chairs, express is annoying
customer_reviews.text: The metal under the table has been treated but it is still easy to scratch the child(remove 1 star). I need to do some protective measures myself. The seat is very stable. The child likes it very much. The ups must be signed. We can't do it at work time. It took me drive fourty minutes to pick up, and it took me 1 hour to build it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: A great desk for our little kids. I can see it will last for years ahead of us.
customer_reviews.text: We got the desk and chair combo for our 4 year old daughter. She loves it. Our almost 2 year old daughter also loves it so much so we are planning on getting another for her too. The only issue that we had with the assembly process was the threaded screw hole on the leg kept turning so one did not end up being so tight. The shelving could be a little sturdier but it will work ok as is.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Parent

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed by how well this desk is made and how ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed by how well this desk is made and how easy to adjust. My 7 year old does all her homework and drawing on this desk and I can see her using it for many more years. I can't imaging buying anything better at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Nye Wang

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: This desk has great quality. It is very sturdy and reliable. My daughter likes its pink color too. They also have great customer service with timely help. I will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Higher Price for a reason
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set a year ago and this one was the most expensive set among many similar choices on Amazon then. I am glad we chose this one. It is sturdy and well made. My daughter loves this set.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Wang

customer_reviews.title: The desk is good and seller is very responsible
customer_reviews.text: I follow the instruction to assemble the desk, but found screw A (the one goes on the crank) couldn't be fit into the hole. Not sure what to do and just leave it without a screw. I sent an email to ApexDesk and got response within minutes. They will send me a replacement. Very positive experience! The desk is good. Steady and big enough for the kid. Kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: daggerfs

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: We're homeschooling and this desk/chair combo is perfect! Easy assembly and well made. The desk has plenty of space and the shelf is perfect to hold a desk lamp as well as some other items (couple of small books, pencil sharpener). Love the versatility of the desktop which can be tilted to use as a draft table. I'm looking forward to my child getting several years of use out of this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love the desk and the chair
customer_reviews.text: We got two sets. My girls both love their desks and chairs. They are so pretty and sturdy. The seller helps a lot when we have some problems. Very good products and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mimiqueen

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by our friend. It is a little bit pricy compared to the other similar products. But this one is a lot bigger, and the quality is much better. I think my daughter can use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: quick assembly
customer_reviews.text: very nice desk, so easy to clean in case your kids color the desk by accident. the chair is very stable, also the whole thing only took 30 minutes to assemble, not bad
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Should be able to last for a while
customer_reviews.text: Grandma bought it for the grand daughter. The kid is so excited to have her own table!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tsao

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, pretty design.
customer_reviews.text: At first, the plastic end-caps of the legs did not attach to each other, the seller sent the new parts free of charge, and now everything is perfect! Our 7-y-o daughter loves it, and uses all the features by herself with no help from us.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Lack of pink lifting rocker
customer_reviews.text: Lack of pink lifting rocker ,the itme use is good!I hope I can reissue the missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: wen

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great desk and chairs. Cool looking assembly a breeze. Company super responsive and helpful. Wish perhaps additional drawers or drawer space and ability to put handle on opposite side but minor. I would buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: We all love the desks
customer_reviews.text: ordered two desks for two girls (different colors). We all love the desks, but we had to go through returns/exchanges multiple times due to the product being damaged (not packaging),

customer_reviews.text: bought this for my kid who is just 5 yrs old. love that it can be adjusted. may last till high school:)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, amazing product & great purchase for my little princess!
customer_reviews.text: I bought pink color set as a birthday and new year present for my 5-year old daughter. She was very happy and excited. I also bought extra cover for the chair, very nice fitting and amazing. Excellent quality, great purchase!!! Yes, I stronly recommend it, also recommend to buy extra cover for chair.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and chair combo
customer_reviews.text: - largest desk in Amazon - good height adjustments for desk and chair - you can lock the wheels on the chair
customer_reviews.author: Chris Li

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Denim Blue desk for my 2nd grader. Have been looking for adjustable desks for a while until I found this one for our "study area". The hand crank works very nice and smooth. Tabletop tilts with a pull of a string. It took about 20 mins or less for my husband to assemble. To my surprise the actual desk looks bigger than the picture so make sure to take measurement before buying one. My son has been using the desk for most of his activities, from doing homework to playtime on iPad. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Eco

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Overall beautiful comfortable desk set for my daughter to grow into.

customer_reviews.title: When my little one seats on the chair  it’s locked and not moving around, very useful feature
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but worth every penny:) very comfortable and sturdy

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good desk. It is very sturdy. My kid is 3 years old and I am looking for a large table for her to do hand work and then later for her to draw and write. I think this is a perfect desk and it can be used for many years. I am so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer-Jing

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews, but design of this product was very simple yet functional. Good quality of product and very easy to assemble due to simple design. Very pricey but good quality as well. Hope it last long time to make it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy desk. Easy to assemble. My son loves it. The height is easily adjustable. Perfect addition to the homework space for kids.

customer_reviews.text: Chair is dirty out of box. Not happy! Will update once customer service gives a solution

customer_reviews.text: Perfect, worth every penny and will last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Good product for my kid and great support from ApexDesk
customer_reviews.text: I've got this desk for my 5 years old kid and she love it. One part of the desk has some issue, I contacted the ApexDesk and got feedback very quick. After talked with me through the phone call, ApexDesk send me the replacement immediately. Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: My children very like ApexDesk furniture (chairs and tables). Very good quality. Very easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: We're satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: high quality and childproof design

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality desk and chair. My daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size desk for elementary school students, easy assembling. Not sure if the chair comes with it is really comfortable for kids or not, I'm 5"3, not a big person , the chair cusion/pad is way to narrow for me to sit on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality needs to be improved
customer_reviews.text: Good product but quality needs to be improved. They do have a very quick response support and taking care my case now. Received replacement parts in 4days, excellent customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hung

customer_reviews.title: Best study table set for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this set. It is very comfortable and functional. She had more space to organize her study. The customer service is best. They replied my email in one minute. Very helpful and professional. I will recommend this to my friends.

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and chair combo.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase. Bought one set last year and my daughter loves it, so we decided to buy another set for other kid. The height is adjustable, which is a great feature since kids grow up fast at this age. Great quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Xu

customer_reviews.title: We love this desk
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in time, and as described. We love this desk, it's generous size and good quality, the height adjustment gear is smooth, very lovely product. I'm glad I purchased it.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really satisfied with this purchase. My 4 year old daughter loves it and want to do art work only at this desk. The quality of the table and chair are amazing! Definitely recommended!

customer_reviews.title: my kids love them and feel comfortable on all the writing
customer_reviews.text: my kids love them and feel comfortable on all the writing, reading, and drawing on it. The service has been excellent..

customer_reviews.title: Apex Desk Little Soleil green
customer_reviews.text: This desk arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. It is exactly what my kindergartener needed. It is easy to clean, sturdy, and the accompanying chair and lamp (solid separately), completed the set-up. Excellent product!

customer_reviews.title: Great desk and chair
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kids desk w beautiful chair. Will last for years

customer_reviews.title: We love this desk
customer_reviews.text: We love this desk. We bought it when our son started kindergarten and he is so happy to have his own desk. Great quality and so easy to adjust it for different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have it set up today, very good, adjustable desk and chair, exactly what we are looking for. I tried the chair myself, very comfortable. My son like it too. Finally there are table and desk that fit for a young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaobin Yan

customer_reviews.title: An adult would fit comfortably in these desks and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my kids, ages 8, 6, 4. An adult would fit comfortably in these desks and chairs. PERFECT! And super fast shipping by ApexDesk. Takes about under 20 mins to put a set of desk and chairs together. Height adjustment on desk is simple, my 4 year old could do it. Very sturdy and good quality. Mine also comes with a metal shelf that hooks onto the desk to hold books, ipad, or etc. a great bonus since it wasn't in any of the pictures. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good design, very solid built.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of adjustable chair and table (desk). Can be adjusted to fit both 4 year old and 6 year old boys, who are below average in height. Will buy another set for the 4 year old.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, Looks nice and the kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Chair back rest have issues .
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is ready. Table is good. However chair is not good. Both my kids experienced back issues. Unfortunately we cannot return chair only. Also return shipping is not free. So be aware .

customer_reviews.title: Great for elementary students
customer_reviews.text: The surface is big and enough for my kid who is currently in elementary school. We have the AlexDesk chair as well. It’s a great combination. Love the set!

As a 4'11" woman, I find regular desks too high for me, and this solved the problem of finding a good writing desk for my height.

product_meta.title: ApexDesk Little Soleil DX 43" Children's Height Adjustable Study Desk w/ Integrated Shelf & Drawer (Desk+Chair Bundle in Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:Desk+chair Bundle - PinkLittle Soleil Children's Adjustable Desk - New 2nd generation Little Soleil Series Height Adjustable Kids Desk now comes with drawer and a desk shelf as part of the set! Height adjustment range has improved, allowing little ones to raised or lowered from 21 to 31 inches high. Split top tilts up to 75 degrees. Top is made of anti-scratch, anti-scuff and easy-to-clean laminate surface which makes maintenance a breeze. Built-in individual leg levers ensure a firm footing regardless of the surface, while rounded corners and rubber bumpers on the surface edges are all designed to minimize bumps and bruises while in use. 

Overall product dimensions: 44" W x 27.6" D x 28" H. Overall product weight: 63 Lbs. 
What's in the Box - Unassembled desk, one drawer, one desk shelf, and installation guide. 

Little Soleil Children's Adjustable Chair - The Little Soleil line of adjustable chair is designed with your child's growing needs in mind. Seat height, seat depth and backrest can be adjusted independently with ease by twist n lock knobs. Simply twist open the knob, slide seat and backrest along anchoring rods and lock them into desired positions. It features a five-caster base, and comfortable seat and backrest. Chair is designed to swivel 15 degree left and right when casters are locked. 

Overall product dimensions: 18" W x 25" D x 33" H. Overall product weight: 30 Lbs. 
What's in the Box - Unassembled chair with instructions.
feature_bullets: 2nd generation desk with crossbar for added stability, and bonus 9.5” x 9” drawer and 18.5” x10” shelf
Large scratch-resistant worksurface 43” x 27”. Desk height adjustment by crank from 21" to 31". All corners & edges are rounded and rubber-banded
28” x 18” split top tilts up to 75 degrees for easy-reading or drawing

Chair adjustable with twist'n'lock knobs. Seat height adjustable from 12" to 21". Backrest height adjustable from 21" to 32". Chair is designed to swivel 15 degree left and right when casters are locked.
